availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Calvin J. Stevens, Sr. (Portsmouth, Scioto County Ohio, brickmaker.)

body.p: Scioto County, Ohio, brickmaker and city marshal. Tennessee native. Married to Cynthia Angeline Ripley Stevens in Scioto County, Ohio, on July 5, 1844. Father of Emma A. Stevens, Anthony W. Stevens, Calvin J. Stevens, Jr., Clara Stevens, and William Stevens. Brickmaker in Scioto County in 1850. Brickmaker in Scioto County in 1860. City marshal for Portsmouth in Scioto County from April 28, 1865, to April 8, 1866.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Scioto County, Wayne Township, p. 225A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Scioto County, Portsmouth, p. 473.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Scioto County, Portsmouth Ward 2, p. 560A.
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Scioto County Marriages, 1804-1867, Film 000292694.
Nelson W. Evans, A History of Scioto County, Ohio: Together with a Pioneer Record of Southern Ohio (Portsmouth, OH: Nelson W. Evans, 1903), 465.
"Calvin J Stevens (1825-1876)," Find A Grave, Memorial 79563485, accessed April 28, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/79563485.
